FindingName: [VULNERABLE] - External Users can Reshare Files,Folders and Sites they do not own!
Description: Sharing and collaboration are key; however, file, folder, or site collection owners should have the authority over what external users get shared with to prevent unauthorized disclosures of information.
Remediation: 1. Connect to SharePoint Online service using Connect-SPOService. > 2. RUN: Set-SPOTenant -PreventExternalUsersFromResharing $True

References.Text: 14.6 Protect Information through Access Control Lists
